description: The darkness is almost absolute in this, The Crypt of Despair.  The
walls are cut from the very rock of the world, lit only by a blue flame
coming from a mystical candle on the wall.  The crypt goes south,
following the darkness and the lingering scent of death in the air.
13705.name: Crypt Of Despair, Level 1

description: Everywhere in this massive chamber is the bubbling and roiling of
red hot molten rock. Rivers of lava twist through the cavern, carrying
massive hunks of yet unmelted stone. Solid platforms appear between
the flowing ribbons of red, the only way to travel through this place
without the aid of flight. Heat, hotter than a blacksmith's forge, makes
it unbearable, but coupled with the stench of the sulfur, its a nightmare.
13723.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rver{Rn{x

description: {8This chamber is just as massive as the previous two.  Blue candles
flicker and light the dark stone in eerie blue light that occasionally
crackles with magical energy.  The scent that clings to the air in this
room is full of putrid decay, as though a bloated corpse has broken
open release the noxious gasses from within its rotting body.{x
13782.name: {&The Lich Guardian{x

description: Everywhere in this massive chamber is the bubbling and roiling of
red hot molten rock. Rivers of lava twist through the cavern, carrying
massive hunks of yet unmelted stone. Solid platforms appear between
the flowing ribbons of red, the only way to travel through this place
without the aid of flight. Heat, hotter than a blacksmith's forge, makes
it unbearable, but coupled with the stench of the sulfur, its a nightmare.
13730.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rver{Rn{x

description: You look closer at the lock and see a symbol upon it:
{x
The symbol reads:
{x
The corridor comes to an end here at a pair of large, locked
doors.  The doors themselves are engraved with symbols and
depictions of ancient relics belonging to someone very important.
A large chain with a lock bars the way, a symbol is engraved
on the lock.
13714.name: Before The Locked Tomb

description: Everywhere in this massive chamber is the bubbling and roiling of
red hot molten rock. Rivers of lava twist through the cavern, carrying
massive hunks of yet unmelted stone. Solid platforms appear between

13727.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rver{Rn{x

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13745.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: Everywhere in this massive chamber is the bubbling and roiling of
red hot molten rock. Rivers of lava twist through the cavern, carrying
massive hunks of yet unmelted stone. Solid platforms appear between
the flowing ribbons of red, the only way to travel through this place
without the aid of flight. Heat, hotter than a blacksmith's forge, makes
it unbearable, but coupled with the stench of the sulfur, its a nightmare.
13726.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rver{Rn{x

description: The walkway leads into this rather large chamber that, oddly
enough, is warm.  An iron staircase spirals down to a lower
level where the sounds of bubbling and steam can be heard.
Back to the north is the flooding chamber and the crypt.
13718.name: The Stairwell to Level 2

description: Further down the staircase lends only to more darkness.  The iron
stairs have rusted in some places where the moisture has caused
them to oxidize.  There is no light, only the cold stone that
rises into the darkness and the smell of wet soil and earth.
13702.name: The Stairs to the Crypt

description: {8This room feels as though it is spinning violently and out
of control. Suddenly it {RSTOPS {8cold. The only way out of this
writhing nightmare is to the west.{x
13763.name: {&A Dizzy Spell{x

description: Everywhere in this massive chamber is the bubbling and roiling of
red hot molten rock. Rivers of lava twist through the cavern, carrying
massive hunks of yet unmelted stone. Solid platforms appear between
the flowing ribbons of red, the only way to travel through this place

13768.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13760.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: {8Here at the bottom of where the stairs used to be, is a very dark
cavern.  Endless rooms seem to form and fade in the darkness.  This
is a place where spirits come to die, deep below in the Crypt of
Despair.  Hallway after hallway, tomb after tome, welcome to the
cacacombs of despair.{x
13738.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13751.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: The expertly hewn walls are momentarily lit by a blue candle
that shines along the corridor.  The runes carved here appear
to be names of some sort - perhaps the occupants of the crypt
itself.  The corridor turns here and heads to the east.
13713.name: Southern Crypt Corridor

description: Everywhere in this massive chamber is the bubbling and roiling of
red hot molten rock. Rivers of lava twist through the cavern, carrying
massive hunks of yet unmelted stone. Solid platforms appear between
the flowing ribbons of red, the only way to travel through this place

it unbearable, but coupled with the stench of the sulfur, its a nightmare.
13732.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rver{Rn{x

description: {*Deeper
{*......Deeper
13778.name: {&The Final Stairwell{x

description: {8This huge chamber is vaulted with arched beams of brick that
disappear into the darkness above.  An incredibly overwhelming
stench of rot and decay hangs in the air here, sticking to skin
and clothes.  In the center of this chamber is a huge hole, large
enough for something massive to use as a hiding place...{x
13780.name: {&The Dracolich Guardian{x

description: You look closer at the floor and see a symbol scratched upon it:
You look closer at the floor and see a symbol scratched upon it:
{*This gargantuan chamber is brightly lit by rows of tall{x
{*candelabras that rise from the ground like fire tipped tridents.{x
{*A large throne sits to the north, behind which is a massive{x
{*oaken door.  The air here is cold and rank with the fetid{x
{*putrescence of decaying corpses.  Dust drifts down in fine{x
{*silted powder which coats the scratched stone floor...{x
13783.name: {&The Crypt Guardian{x

description: This corridor in the crypt is dark, but the blue-grey walls
are expertly hewn and engraved with ancient runes.  The floor
is dirt, but seems clear of any sort of debris.  The corridor
continues to the south and back to the north.
13712.name: Southern Crypt Corridor

description: Going down the stairs, the air has become increasingly hot.  A
red glow lights the narrow stairwell and the heavy smell of sulfur
hangs in the air thick enough to induce choking.  The bubbling and
steam can be heard louder now, all coming from below...
13716.name: The Stairwell to Level 2

description: {x
"{RAAAAAA{rARRRRRR{YRRRRG{yGGGGG{YGGGGG{rHHHHHHH{RHHHHHH{x"
{x
A misstep sucks you into the molten rock and through a
portal.  At light speed you are pulled through a fiery
tunnel only to be spat, face first, onto a cold stone
floor.  To your side is a small ladder leading down...
13790.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rv{*e{rr{Rn{x

description: The eastern part of the crypt has long holes recessed into the walls,
each the size of a casket, some filled with dusty bones.  A large door
stands to the north, leading into the Northeast Tomb.  Eerie blue light
fills this crypt and creates a purple cast against the dirt on the
ground.
13707.name: The Eastern Part of the Crypt

description: {8Magic lettering glitters at the slightest touch of light and reads:
{x
{C"Behind these doors lay treasures and loot,
{CThough if taken in hand, your life may be moot.
{CTreasures to add you to the annals of legend,
{CJust be certain you have aid from your brethren.
{CBeware of your neck, your fist, and your hide,
{CAnd you may well make it from these crypts alive."{x

{*This massive antechamber is adorned with many gruesome metal spikes{x
{*that protrude from the stone floor.  Fortunately, they are easy to{x
{*walk around.  Two great doors block the way forward.  They are marked{x
{*with scrolling inscriptions, written in magic that appears to shimmer{x
{*with the faintest touch of light.  There is no longer any way to go{x
{*but forward, as the stone stairs, so solid and formidable, have{x
{*vanished like a mist.{x
13779.name: {WBefore the Tomb of the Guardians{x

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13769.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: At the merest disturbance, the dust - settled for many long years -
rises into the air.  A large metal casket sits in front of its grave
stone.  The tomb is very small and lit by the same blue candles found
within the rest of the crypt.  The sound of running water can be heard
coming from somewhere in the room.
13708.name: Northeast Tomb

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless

13757.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: The tomb here is tiny and readily induces cases of claustrophobia in
any unread for these gruesome stone walls.  Piles of bones in recessed
holes gather dust.  The age old putrefaction of flesh has made the
tomb toxic, having been left closed for so long...
13791.name: {&The Tomb of The Lost Souls{x

description: {*| {RATTENTION ALL WHO DARE ENTER THE CRYPT OF DESPAIR {*|
{*| {CAttention all who dare enter this area{c, this area {*|
{*| {ccontains {Rhero level mobs{c, and is also {Cone large   {*|
{*| {Cdeath trap{c. After this point, {Cthe area will turn  {*|
{*| {cinto {Rtotal darkness, no recall, and no gate{c. This {*|
{*| {cis a death trap, but a new kind. In the future a  {*|
{*| {cprize will be at the end. This Crypt contains {R4   {*|
{*| {Rlevels{c, each contains {Cclues, monsters{c, and very   {*|
{*| {clarge {Cmazes{c. {MEnter At Your Own Risk{c, The {RImms     {*|
{*| {RNOT RESCUE YOU FROM THIS AREA{c. Travelers Beware.  {*|
{*|    {&The Crypt Of Despair: NissTechnology Test 1    {*|
{xExtra Credits to Helm for his mobs.{x
{wThe stairs open into a stone room deep within the bowels of the earth.
The smell of wet, damp ground is strong here, along with the smell of
death.  A doorway to the south leads to The Crypt of Despair.  The
western wall bears a very {Rimportant{w and historical engraving.
13704.name: Entrance To The Crypt Of Despair

description: Everywhere in this massive chamber is the bubbling and roiling of
red hot molten rock. Rivers of lava twist through the cavern, carrying
massive hunks of yet unmelted stone. Solid platforms appear between
the flowing ribbons of red, the only way to travel through this place
without the aid of flight. Heat, hotter than a blacksmith's forge, makes
it unbearable, but coupled with the stench of the sulfur, its a nightmare.
13719.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rver{Rn{x

description: The smell of wet soil and earth is strong here.  The stairs have
come down into even blacker darkness, if such a thing is possible.
A slight tinge of rust floats in the air, disturbed by a light
movement of air from above.  Here, the blackness reigns supreme.
13703.name: The Stairs to the Crypt

description: It is a small casket bearing an engraved symbol:
{x
The symbol reads:
{x
This tomb is large and was built to honor the dead of a very
elite group of warriors.  A small casket sits in the center of
the room, engraved with a symbol.  In the walls are the recessed
resting places of the warriors, as evidenced by the armor that
still remains though the bodies are long decayed.
13715.name: Tomb Of The Lost Warrior

description: Dust falls from the secret hatch above that leads to the chapel.
A large iron staircase goes down into the darkness, cut into the
solid stone.  Above is the Jaster's Ring of the Bells.  Below,
darkness...
13700.name: The Stairs to the Crypt

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x

13722.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rver{Rn{x

description: At last, the other side of the fiery cavern.  Here another iron
staircase twists its way downward and into the depths of the crypt.
It appears the only way out, as the other stairwell is far across
the streaming, bubbling, caustic rivers of lava.  Cool air comes
from the depths, a welcome respite to the heat and fumes found here.
13736.name: Stairwell to Level 3

description: A small set of stairs leads into this, the flooding chamber.  It
seems to be here in order to take on water in the case the crypt
fills during strong downpours.  A walkway crosses over a large
pit full of water, the chamber doing its intended work.  There is
an archway at the southern end that leads toward a stairwell.
13709.name: The Flooding Chamber

description: You look closer at the lock and see a symbol upon it:
You look closer at the lock and see a symbol upon it:
The western part of the crypt is lined with holes within the
stone, long enough for a human body, and filled with quite a
few ancient bones resting in the dark.  The crypt continues
to the south, while a large door leads to the Northwest Tomb.
A large chain with a lock bars the way, a symbol is engraved
on the lock.
13710.name: The Western Part of the Crypt

description: {8This is the end of the winding catacombs, a small niche in the
rock wall where a wide stone staircase descends into the depths of
the crypts and into darkness.  Cold air billows from the stairwell,
oozing along the floor like vaporous tentacles.{x
13777.name: {&The Stairwell To The Last Level{x

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x

of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13761.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: All along the staircase, the solid stone rises up, hewn from the
very depths of the earth.  The stairs continue down into the
darkness, the only light coming from that which adventurers may
carry.  The smell of wet soil and earth is strong in this cavern.
13701.name: The Stairs to the Crypt

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless

13724.name: {&The {RF{rir{Ye Ca{rver{Rn{x

description: {8The arched beams of bricks vault up and away into the darkness
of this mighty chamber.  Everything but the brick arches is carved
from the stone of the earth.  It is dank, cold, and dark, and filled
with the same sulfuric smell as the lava chamber above.{x
13781.name: {&The Inferno Guardian{x

description: {WThis is the {8Vault of Despair{W, the heart and soul of the whole crypt.
A large chest sits to the north, surrounded by precious {Gj{ge{Mw{me{gl{Gs {Wand
{Rg{rem{Rs{W. {YGold{W coins cover the rest of the room in piles that seem to reach
{Wto the ceiling, glittering in the light of the torches that hang on the
walls.{x
13784.name: {*The Crypt of Despair Vault{x

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13742.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13753.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: The stairwell stops here before an archway that looks out into a
massive cavern filled with fire and brimstone.  Looking back, the
stairwell has vanished completely, removed by undetected magic.
The only way now is into the superheated sulfuric cavern that sits
to the south.
13717.name: The Stairwell to Level 2

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13771.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: {*This hidden tomb is large and was Nihime's original resting place.{x
{*A large casket sits in the center of the room, flanked by rows of{x
{*unlit candelabras.  A ladder leads up through a secret hatch in the{x
{*ceiling.{x
13786.name: {*N{Ri{rhi{Rm{*e's Tomb{x

description: The sound of running water can be heard in this tomb, a steady
trickle from an unknown source.  A small casket lies in the center
of the floor in front of a headstone.  The tomb is small and only
contains a single occupant, this was obviously someone special.
13711.name: Northwest Tomb

description: {8This room feels as though it is spinning violently and out
of control. Suddenly it {RSTOPS {8cold. The only way out of this
writhing nightmare is to the south.{x
13752.name: {&A Dizzy Spell{x

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13762.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: This, the center of the crypt, is surrounded by blue candles that
cast a mystical glow on every surface.  The hewn stone is cool here,
but moist with the dampness of the air.  To the east and west are
paths leading to different parts of the crypt.  South stands a large
locked door.
13706.name: The Center Of The Crypt

description: {8The Tomb of the Lost Souls is an entire catacomb full of endless
hallways where heroes, legends, and peasants alike have been laid to
rest.  The walls are inset with rectangular holes that hold the bones
of those interred here, their skeletons dusty and brittle.{x
13756.name: {&The Tomb Of The Lost Souls{x

description: The staircase continues to wind deeper and deeper into the
recesses of the world itself.  The stone cut away here is
roughly hewn and moist to the touch.  The metal of this
staircase is rusted in places as it dips into the dankness
of the crypts below.
13737.name: Stairwell to Level 3

description:
{8A small minor skeleton that stands at the height of an
average human.  This is one of the unfortunate victims
of Untoliant's wrath left to rot and be raised again to
serve him.{x
13700.room_name: {WA skeleton stands here, hand wrapped around a club-like femur.{x
13700.name: {Wa skeleton{x~

description:
{WUntoliant {8is a large animated skeleton with bits of armor hanging
off of his dessicated frame.  He stands at 8 feet tall and wields
a long club made of what apears to be bone.  Pin pricks of light
illuminate his otherwise empty eye sockets.{x
13701.room_name: {*A giant skeleton stands here, towering over the rest of his kind.{x
13701.name: {WUntoliant{x~

description:
{8This is the soul of a dead adventurer, trapped in the crypts
and left to die many years ago.  His wails are almost deafening
as he floats about the room looking for something living to
take his misery out on.{x
13704.room_name: A {rt{Rw{*i{Ws{*t{Re{rd{x {Bs{cou{Bl{x hopes to drown its unending pain with blood.
13704.name: {xa {rt{Rw{Di{Ws{Dt{Re{rd{x {Bs{cou{Bl{x~

description:
{8The semi-transparent leftovers of a once great mage floats
about the room aimlessly.  He apears dressed in his finest
wizard robes.  His lips move constantly as he mutters to
himself about something uninteligible.{x
13705.room_name: {*A powerful, twisted soul floats here malevolently.{x

room having been shed from this once magnificent beast.  His eyes glow

He wears old tatters mage robes and has several wands belted about
